ModMetaData.name: [XND] Ranged Stagger Rebalanced
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Current version: v1.1.3 (17th October 2018)\n\nRebalances ranged stagger so that the stagger duration depends on the difference between the weapon's stopping power and target's body size, rather than always being a flat 95 ticks.
